messages.title: Supporting local communities in Aberdeenshire East
messages.content: Dear voter, I am standing because we need someone who will challenge the SNP's austerity policies and their refusal to use the new powers. Scottish Labour's plans to generate half a billion pounds with fair tax measures will fund real change in education, health and housing - changes that will improve the lives of ordinary people. We need both of your votes so we have a strong voice in Holyrood to speak out against the hardship in Aberdeenshire and the North East of Scotland. A real voice for you in Parliament and locally.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Support for the oil and gas industry
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Sarah Flavell and Scottish Labour will work to sustain the oil and gas industry and to diversify through renewable energy.
They pledge to guarantee a major trauma centre in Aberdeen and ensure ARI's future as a flagship hospital.
They plan to take the attainment gap with their Fair Start Fund and support Aberdeenshire Council's next wave of teachers.

issues.education: Scottish Labour's plans include funding for education from fair tax measures.
issues.environment: Sarah Flavell and Scottish Labour plan to diversify through renewable energy.
issues.governance: Sarah Flavell stands against SNP's refusal to use the new powers.
issues.health: They will guarantee a major trauma centre in Aberdeen and ensure ARI's future as a flagship hospital.

housing.content: Scottish Labour's plans to generate half a billion pounds with fair tax measures will fund real change in housing.

leaflet.personalStatement: A real voice for you in Parliament and locally.

quotes.text: Scottish Labour is the only party promising to use Scotland's new powers to improve education, health and housing

images.caption: Sarah Flavell, Scottish Labour candidate for Aberdeenshire East
